mapper.insert: INSERT INTO argon.MESSAGES (BODY, USER_ID, CHAT_ID, ATTACHMENT, IS_READ) VALUES( #{body}, #{user.id}, #{chat.id}, #{attachment}, #{isRead} )
mapper.sql: SELECT M.ID AS MESSAGE_ID, M.ATTACHMENT AS MESSAGE_ATTACHMENT, M.CREATED_AT AS MESSAGE_CREATED_AT, M.BODY AS MESSAGE_BODY, M.MODIFIED_AT AS MESSAGE_MODIFIED_AT, M.IS_READ AS MESSAGE_IS_READ, U.ID AS USER_ID, U.LAST_NAME AS USER_LAST_NAME, U.DOB AS USER_DOB, U.USERNAME AS USER_USERNAME, U.PASSWORD AS USER_PASSWORD, U.ENABLED AS USER_ENABLED, U.VERIFIED AS USER_VERIFIED, U.CREATED_AT AS USER_CREATED_AT, U.EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL, U.FIRST_NAME AS USER_FIRST_NAME, U.MODIFIED_AT AS USER_MODIFIED_AT, C.CREATED_AT AS CHAT_CREATED_AT, C.MODIFIED_AT AS CHAT_MODIFIED_AT, C.NAME AS CHAT_NAME, C.ID AS CHAT_ID, ST.ID AS STATUS_ID, ST.STATUS AS STATUS_TYPE, ST.MODIFIED_AT AS STATUS_MODIFIED_AT, ST.CREATED_AT AS STATUS_CREATED_AT, A.ID AS AUTHORITY_ID, A.AUTHORITY AS AUTHORITY_TYPE, A.MODIFIED_AT AS AUTHORITY_MODIFIED_AT, A.CREATED_AT AS AUTHORITY_CREATED_AT FROM argon.MESSAGES M LEFT JOIN argon.USERS U ON M.USER_ID = U.ID LEFT JOIN argon.CHATS C ON M.CHAT_ID = C.ID LEFT JOIN argon.STATUSES ST ON U.STATUS_ID = ST.ID LEFT JOIN argon.USER_AUTHORITIES UA ON U.ID = UA.USER_ID LEFT JOIN argon.AUTHORITIES A ON UA.AUTHORITY_ID = A.ID
mapper.update: UPDATE argon.MESSAGES M SET ATTACHMENT = #{attachment}, BODY = #{body}, IS_READ = #{isRead}, USER_ID = #{user.id}, CHAT_ID = #{chat.id} WHERE M.ID = #{id}
